name: LaplacianRecursiveGaussianImageFilter

members.name: Sigma
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set Sigma value. Sigma is measured in the units of image spacing.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Set Sigma value. Sigma is measured in the units of image spacing.

members.name: NormalizeAcrossScale
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Define which normalization factor will be used for the Gaussian\see RecursiveGaussianImageFilter::SetNormalizeAcrossScale
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Define which normalization factor will be used for the Gaussian\see RecursiveGaussianImageFilter::SetNormalizeAcrossScale

briefdescription: Computes the Laplacian of Gaussian (LoG) of an image.
detaileddescription:
Computes the Laplacian of Gaussian (LoG) of an image by convolution with the second derivative of a Gaussian. This filter is implemented using the recursive gaussian filters.

\par Wiki Examples:

\li All Examples 

\li Compute the Laplacian of Gaussian (LoG) of an image
